snippet.title: Tram Simulator Urban Transit - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
We are happy to celebrate the release of Tram Simulator Urban Transit. The new simulation game is now available for PC on Steam. Dedicated versions for PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and PC on the Epic Games Store and the Microsoft Store will follow in spring 2024!

Subscribe to our channel to stay up-to-date: https://www.youtube.com/astragon?sub_confirmation=1

👨‍🌾 Get the game on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2546690/

👨‍🌾 What you can expect from Tram Simulator Urban Transit 👨‍🌾
Tram Simulator Urban Transit gives streetcar fans the opportunity to set up their own public transport company in the fictitious US metropolis of Angel Shores. The game offers players 6 drivable streetcars - three different models, each in two different lengths - including detailed and interactive cockpits. In addition to being able to define and drive your own routes, you can also control your passengers' tickets. Of course, players should also keep an eye on the traffic and the numerous random events that await them during their journeys!

In Tram Simulator Urban Transit, players have three different game modes to choose from: In Story mode, there are more than 10 challenging missions to master as part of the exciting campaign. In Career mode, players can start their tram company without any guidelines and expand it according to their wishes - due to the low starting capital, it is of course important to manage well while trying to lead the company to success. In Sandbox mode, meanwhile, streetcar fans can create their company without any limits - everything is unlocked directly and players have unlimited funds at their disposal, so they can develop completely freely right from the start. All three game modes can of course also be played in multiplayer with up to three additional players.

Tram Simulator Urban Transit is now available at a price of 19.99 EUR / 19.99 USD (SRP) for PC on Steam. Dedicated versions for PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One and for PC on the Epic Games Store and the Microsoft Store are planned for spring 2024.

Owners of astragon’s Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Official Tram Extension or the Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Season Pass will automatically receive free access to Tram Simulator Urban Transit! Conversely, buyers of Tram Simulator Urban Transit receive free access to Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Official Tram Extension (main game required to play)!

More detailed information about Tram Simulator Urban Transit can be found here: https://www.tram-simulator.com

Instagram:  https://www.instagram.com/astragon_entertainment
